services.title: Master's Project
services.description: Our team worked to inform decision-making on community forests in the eastern region of the Democratic Republic of Congo to protect the critically endangered Eastern Lowland gorilla while simultaneously improving the wellbeing of local communities.

services.title: Saving western monarchs
services.description: We have been working to promote the western monarch migration by crafting a communication campaign aimed toward California central coast nurseries and their customers.

services.title: Forest Tool
services.description: Creating a science synthesis platform for forest sustainability
